primary.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Our primary concern is to provide the refugees with food and health care.
Many of the villagers rely on fishing as their primary source of income.
Personal safety is of primary importance.
Their primary objective is to make money.
primary.translation[0].definitions[1].de: relating to the education of children between 5 and 11 years old
primary.translation[0].definitions[2].de: happening or developing before other things
primary.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Counselling was given as a primary therapy for depression.
primary.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Its primary business is developing and marketing new software.
The primary problem for the airlines is the recession.
It uses coal as its primary source of fuel.
primary.translation[2].definitions[1].de: relating to shares, bonds etc when they are ISSUED (=sold for the first time), and the markets where they are sold, rather than shares etc that are traded later
